snippet.title: Imagine -- Fashion World 3D Official Trailer [UK]
snippet.description: Imagine®, the original Games for Girls brand, is introducing a brand-new ultra-realistic fashion game on the Nintendo 3DS™ system where players can experience three fabulous fashion careers: Fashion Designer, Top Model and Mall Owner! This 3D game features high-quality, realistic graphics and allows players with a love of all things fashion to truly unleash their creativity and business savvy.
